class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from June 16 - August 10, 2024. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu.
course_description: Offered only in Emory's summer study abroad program in China, the course aims to develop students' advanced skills in Chinese through reading, discussing, and writing about topics on modern China. Students will develop an enriched understanding of the traditions and changes in Chinese culture.
sections: Class Nbr: 1425, Section #: 900, Type: ABR, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: H. Li, Status: Open
